channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 1st May
item.description:
The blocked drain is outside number 3 Church Walk, Charlton Kings. It's situated on the public footpath part of Church Walk leading down towards the ford. The problem has been there for some months and has gradually got worse over time due to the amount of rainwater and general detritus that flows down the slope of the footpath, blocks the drain, and then pools in the nearby driveway. It is a regular occurrence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Walk, Charlton Kings, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 1st May
item.description:
Having gone that way today, there seem to be some potholes and other defects on Goldsmith Road. The definite pothole is near the jct with Goldsmith Close. However, there are some other defects that seem likely to turn into potholes in the near future.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Many potholes, 1st May
item.description:
All along by the new build site on Old Glos Road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayden Road, Springbank, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign is faded on both sides, 1st May
item.description:
Speed limit sign is faded on both sides, making it less prominent to drivers. There is now a speed camera on this stretch of road and none of the speed limit signs on it are adequate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign is illegible in both directions, 1st May
item.description:
Sign is illegible in both directions, on one side due to fading, on both sides due to Ivy and cannot be seen travelling West because it is behind the line of the hedge. There is now a speed camera on this stretch of road and none of the speed limit signs conform to standard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Speed limit sign faded and illegible from both directions, 1st May
item.description:
The speed limit sign is faded and illegible from both sides and there is now a speed camera installed on this road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in pavement problem, 1st May
item.description:
Pavement has been left in such a state that the residents cannot get out of their driveway, or in it. Please can something be done. Taxis have had to be taken to and from work.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sign has faded red surround and is hidden by overgrown hedge, 1st May
item.description:
Both sides of the sign, the red surround is faded making it less noticeable by drivers and it is hidden behind an overgrown hedge, making it invisible to drivers heading West, shortly before the newly placed speed camera

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Recent repair not fit for purpose, 1st May
item.description:
Near what 3 ///amending.rested.disbanded On road through woods in dip, recent repair is badly done and breaking again. From the start, this repair wasn't done properly, it looks like tarmac was thrown at it at speed. This stretch needs resurfacing properly so that it lasts longer than a few weeks before needing doing again. Please can this be done once and for all

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Withington, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The Red surround on the sign has faded, 1st May
item.description:
The Red surround on the sign has faded, making it less noticeable to drivers and there is now a speed camera on this road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Woodmancote, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of pairs of potholes, 1st May
item.description:
Near where the electric wires cross the road there is a series of pairs of potholes, axel width apart. Not just the ones pictured but several more pairs in the direction of the road between Colesbourne and Withington

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Withington, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet
